amendment.description: To ensure that ports that play a critical role in our national energy policy remain eligible for port security grants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4961 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4961 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S9604-9605) To ensure that ports that play a critical role in our national energy policy remain eligible for port security grants.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4961 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Vitter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4961 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
